Name: Mega Potion
Effect: \healhp{100} to each member of a party

Name: Ultra Potion
Effect: \healhp{200} to each member of a party

Name: Elixir
Effect: Refills HP and MP to their maximums

Name: Megalixir
Effect: Refills HP and MP to their maximums, to each member of a party

Name: Phoenix Down
Effect: Revives an unconscious character with 1 HP

Name: Phoenix Pinion
Effect: Revives an unconscious character with maximum HP

Name: Mega Phoenix
Effect: Revives any unconscious characters in a party with 1 HP

Name: Phoenix Spirit
Effect: Revives any unconscious characters in a party with maximum HP

Name: Hero Drink
Effect: Casts all of \tspell{Magic Up}, \tspell{Armor Up}, \tspell{Mental Up}, and \tspell{Power Up} on the same target
